title: BBC Local Live: Devon & Cornwall on Friday 27 October 2017 - BBC News
summary: man dies after car river plunge .
cornish rugby legend brian 'stack ' stevens ' funeral .
eleven people evacuated from cornish pub fire .
- firefighters called to halfway house inn near wadebridge after blaze reported in early hours .
engineers work to repair damaged gas pipe in exeter .
tom daley collects honorary degree in plymouth .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from the cornwall and devon bbc local live team for today .
we 're back on monday at 08:00 with more news , travel , sport and weather .
do n't forget spotlight on bbc one later .
there will also be news through the weekend on your bbc local radio station .
author: Hayley Westcott
BBC News Online

documents.title: baby death sparks north devon hospital maternity unit probe
text: north devon hospital has made `` immediate '' changes after the death of a baby at its maternity unit .
the death is among a number of `` incidents '' being investigated at the barnstaple unit .
it was branded as requiring improvement by care quality commission inspectors in 2015 .
the hospital said the `` the death of any baby is always a very sad and serious incident and this will always result in an investigation '' .
it refuted reports that staff had been suspended .
author: Jonathan Morris
BBC News Online

documents.title: five changes for chiefs as they head to sale
text: exeter make five changes for tonight 's trip to sale as they play just five days after winning at montpellier in the champions cup .
props carl rimmer and harry williams , ollie atkins and newly called-up england back-row sam simmonds all come in , while winger james short starts .
`` the people who are responsible for organising european tv fixtures are well aware we have a friday night fixture .
that 's been in the schedule for quite some time prior to the european schedule .
it 's one of those things , '' director of rugby rob baxter told bbc sport when asked about their short turnaround between games .

`` it 's obviously a frustration to me , especially as we seem to be the focal point as professional coaches as to how we have to look after and maintain the balance of players , but then you get those opportunities taken out of your hands .

`` it still seems in this day and age , when we have so much talk on player welfare that the two tv companies - one who lines up for the european games and the other for the premiership - ca n't seem to work these things out , so that you do n't get these turnarounds . ''
sale : addison ( capt ) ; solomona , james , jennings , mcguigan ; o'connor , de klerk ; harrison , webber , john , evans , ostrikov , ross , t curry , strauss .
replacements : jones , flynn , aulika , nott , ioane , neild , cliff , haley .
exeter : dollman ; turner , slade , whitten , short ; steenson , white ; rimmer , yeandle ( capt ) , williams , lees , atkins , armand , simmonds , waldrom .
replacements : taione , hepburn , francis , hill , skinner , townsend , hendrickson , o'flaherty .
author: Brent Pilnick
BBC Sport

documents.title: attempted assault in exeter
text: police are appealing for witnesses following an attempted assault in exeter .
at about 09:45 on wednesday , 25 october , a disturbance took place in the area near polsloe bridge , monks road and hamlin lane .
it is believed the incident involved two men and a 17-year-old woman .
officers want to hear from anyone that may have seen a dark coloured vehicle , possibly a vw polo or a golf in the area during this time .
the men are described as both between the age of 18-22 , both white and wearing puffer jackets .
anyone with information is asked to contact devon and cornwall police via 101 @ dc.police.uk .
author: Hayley Westcott
BBC News Online

documents.title: weather update : a clear evening with a bright start tomorrow
text: skies will stay clear through the evening and it will be dry through the night .
saturday 's early mist and fog will clear as the breeze up during the morning .
it will be with a bright start to the weekend for most with highs of 15c ( 59f ) .
author: David Braine
Weather Forecaster

documents.title: exeter gas supply should be restored this evening
text: engineers are working to restore gas to 1,000 homes that have been without supply since contractors building a new ikea store in exeter damaged the network .
wales and west utilities says it hopes to have `` gas back on to the majority of homes this evening '' .
darryl goddard , area engineering manager , said : `` contractors working to build a new ikea store in the newcourt way area of exeter yesterday evening have seriously damaged the gas network .
`` we have more than 50 engineers working round the clock to get the gas flowing again as safely and as quickly as possible .
`` we are giving vulnerable customers in the area alternative heating and cooking facilities if required . ''

documents.title: exeter traders reveal impact of hotel fire 12 months on
text: local businesses say they 're still feeling the impact a year after fire ripped through the royal clarence hotel on exeter 's cathedral green .
some traders have told the bbc they 've been challenged by a lower footfall and have had to diversify and put on special offers to survive .
described as the 'oldest hotel in england ' the fire caused destruction in october 2016 as more than 100 firefighters , police and paramedics tackled the blaze .
the hotel is due to reopen in 2019 .
author: BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: plans to axe free sunday parking and raise winter charges at dawlish warren
text: shock proposals to end free sunday parking and to provide a steep hike in winter parking charges are on the cards for one of devon 's most popular and busiest beaches .
author: Devon Live

documents.title: gulls get fitness boost for hartlepool game
text: torquay united manager gary owers has been boosted by news that yan klukowski , san chaney , jake gosling and myles anderson have all returned to full-time training .
midfielders klukowski , chaney and gibraltar international gosling have all been out since the end of august , while defender anderson has been missing for a month .
the gulls will be without rhys murphy after hurting his ankle in the win at ebbsfleet on tuesday , while fellow forward jon-paul pittman is also out .
`` we 've gone away from home , put in two really good performances , and we 've got four points for our rewards , '' owers told bbc sport .
`` the big thing for me is saturday , trying to reproduce one of those performances in front of our own supporters . ''
author: Brent Pilnick
BBC Sport

documents.title: petition to stop cuts to forces gathers momentum
text: more than 10,000 people have signed a petition calling for a stop to any cuts to the royal navy and royal marines .

the petition was set up by plymouth sutton and devonport mp luke pollard in response to speculation that the ministry of defence might scrap devonport-based hms albion and hms bulwark and reducing the royal marines .
ten thousand signatures means it 's now reached the stage where the government has to issue a formal response .
author: Jenny Kumah
Daily and Sunday Politics reporter

documents.title: tom daley : 'marriage is doing me good '
text: tom daley has credited new husband , dustin lance black , for the `` absolutely insane year '' he has had .
the 23-year-old diver was back in his home city of plymouth today to collect his honorary degree from marjon university .
speaking after the ceremony , daley said `` i got married in may and my husband lance has been so supportive of me .
my first ever competition as a married man was the world championships and i won !
so obviously marriage is doing me good . ''
daley married the us film director at a luxury hotel in devon in may .
author: Clare Woodling
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: facebook post about plymouth paedophile pair lands man in a cell
text: a convicted robber 's comments during the sarah gotham and craig forbes case got him in serious trouble .
author: Plymouth Herald

documents.title: tom daley receives honorary degree : 'i feel a little bit smarter today '
text: plymouth-born diver tom daley has been back in his home city today after being awarded an honorary degree from plymouth marjon university .
the 23-year-old world champion and olympic athlete has told the bbc he visits plymouth `` once a month '' and it 's always nice to see his mum and family .
daley secured the gold medal at the world championships earlier this year after winning the individual 10m platform event .
`` education has always been something that 's very important to me , always wanting something to fall back on and i feel a little bit smarter today '' , daley added after the ceremony .
author: Clare Woodling
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: owner has 'thumb bitten off ' in dog fight
text: a beach walker says he was left in shock for several days after a dog fight on a beach in newquay .
author: Cornwall Live

documents.title: funeral of cornish rugby legend brian 'stack ' stevens takes place
text: the funeral of former england and british and irish lions prop brian 'stack ' stevens has taken place .
the 77-year-old captained england once in 1971 but played mainly in his native cornwall for penzance and newlyn and hayle .
the funeral was held at st mary the virgin church in penzance where brian 's wife , jane , and sons sam and john attended .

the rugby football union ( rfu ) paid tribute to stevens when his death was announced on 12 october , saying his `` outstanding and athletic county performances '' brought him selection for the national team .
author: Eleanor Parkinson
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: exeter gas leak : fifty engineers working on repair as hundreds of homes without gas
text: a utility company repairing a damaged gas main in exeter says it has visited 90 % of affected homes .
darryl goddard , from wales & west utilities , said : `` contractors working to build a new ikea store in the newcourt way area of exeter have seriously damaged the gas network .
`` due to the scale of the damage , we have had to turn off part of the gas network in the area to fix it .
`` this means that gas supply has been temporarily interrupted to approximately 1000 homes .
we have now visited 90 % of affected homes to turn their gas off and are making good progress in repairing the damage to the pipe .
`` we will need to visit every customer again to safely turn their gas back on .
all our engineers are carrying identification .
this is a very complex job we are still not yet able to say how long it will take .
`` we have more than 50 engineers working round the clock to get the gas flowing again as safely and as quickly as possible . ''
author: Hamish Marshall
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: matthews keeps his place in argyle goal
text: plymouth argyle will again play emergency loanee remi matthews in goal when they host rochdale at home park on saturday .
the norwich keeper made his debut last week and could be at home park for some time with luke mccormick , robbert te loeke and kyle letheren all out with long-term injuries .
lionel ainsworth returned to action in a reserve game midweek , while jamie ness is due to return to training after the weekend .
but oscar threlkeld , nadir ciftci and ryan taylor are all still injured .
author: Brent Pilnick
BBC Sport

documents.title: weather update : dry and bright
text: it will be dry and bright for the rest of the day , with plenty of sunshine and light winds .
maximum temperature : 16c ( 59 f )
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: dolphins spotted off cornish beach
text: some great footage has been released of dolphins surfing off godrevy beach in cornwall .
but it 's not the first time there have been some close encounters in the county :
surfing dolphins on godrevy beach # cornwall .
great spot from tina stern
cornwall 's own version of blue planet !
right on
brilliant !
this seal pup spent a chunk of time in charlestown harbour on thursday morning -
magical

wow wish i 'd been there to see them .
that gave me goosebumps , so amazing to see .
cornwall i miss you x

! x

i also like the rural nature of spotlight , and david brain
i would love to see them in their natural havbitta !
x

omg !
@ twitterid
@ twitterid we riding waves .

hogging the line up .

author: BBC Spotlight

documents.title: exeter gas leak : 'i do n't like cooking anyway , we 'll just get a takeaway '
text: engineers are still working to repair a `` seriously damaged '' gas main near the new ikea store in exeter .
about 1,000 properties in the area have had their gas supply disrupted as wales and west utilities try to fix the problem .
the company has been knocking on the doors of affected residents and says it does n't know how long the repairs will take .
i 've had to put the electric boiler on to have hot water .
i ca n't do no cooking because i cook by gas .
i do n't mind because i do n't like cooking a lot anyway so we 'll just get a takeaway ! ''
author: Hamish Marshall
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: major rescue operation to try and save man after river plunge
text: police , coastguard and firefighters were all involved in a major operation to try and save a man who was found in a car in a river in devon .
torbay coastguard joined devon and cornwall police and devon and somerset fire and rescue service at the scene in newton abbot at about 06:20 on friday .
the man was rescued from the vehicle in the river lemon and was taken to torbay hospital .
he died shortly after arriving , police said .
his death is not believed to be sus
author: Hayley Westcott
BBC News Online

documents.title: holmes and woodman return for exeter city
text: craig woodman and lee holmes are available for exeter city as they look to end a run of two successive defeats when they travel to mansfield .
the pair missed last week 's 1-0 loss to port vale which saw city drop to fourth in league two .
ryan harley is still working his way back to fitness while defenders jordan tillson and luke croll are out .
`` mansfield have some good players - they have n't been too bad at home at all this year , '' exeter city manager paul tisdale told bbc sport .
`` they have a manager who drives his team and maximises their potential and has done with every team he 's had . ''
author: Brent Pilnick
BBC Sport

documents.title: jeremy corbyn appears on stage in barnstaple
text: labour party leader jeremy corbyn made an appearance in north devon last night , despite a 'bumpy ' ride to barnstaple on the tarka line .
author: North Devon Gazette

documents.title: cornwall travel : road blocked and queuing traffic
text: cornwall travel : road blocked and queuing traffic
author: BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: devon travel : four vehicle accident blocks lane
text: devon travel : four vehicle accident blocks lane
author: BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: exeter gas leak : disruption to homes in the area
text: wales and west utilities staff are going door to door to about 1,000 properties in exeter after a gas main pipe was `` seriously damaged '' .
the gas supply to 33 streets in the area by the site of the new ikea store will be `` temporarily interrupted '' after a main pipe was accidentally cut through on thursday night .
it is still not known how long the repair works will take , staff said .
staff from wales and west utilities on site at ikea , exeter trying to fix the broken main .
they do n't know how long it will take .
author: Hamish Marshall
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: safety concerns prompt dartmoor drone ban
text: there 's a ban on flying drones on dartmoor after complaints they 're affecting people 's enjoyment of the area as well as concerns over safety .
dartmoor national park says it 's using a by-law to regulate unmanned vehicles with reports of them being flown too close to people , cars and livestock .
devon and cornwall police say they 've warned five people in the last six months about flouting the guidelines .
the national park says some drone use will still be allowed , but only with permission .
author: Kirk England
BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: a halloween guide to being scary in six easy steps
text: rosie redvers-jones looks perfectly friendly until you ask her to be scary !
the actor has a masters degree in making performance in which she specialised in `` scare acting '' .
she has devised a spooky method using six body moves which she is teaching to actors performing in the event screamfest in tatenhill , staffordshire .
author: BBC News England

documents.title: truro must 'pause ' fa cup ambitions
text: truro city goalkeeper tom mchale says the club must 'pause ' their fa cup ambitions and focus on getting back to winning ways in the league .
the white tigers host struggling bognor regis town having seen their 10-game unbeaten run come to an end at wealdstone last week .
city got an away trip to league one side charlton athletic in last week 's fa cup first round draw after making the main stages of the competition for the first time in their history .
`` it was the dream draw for us , where we are in the football pyramid to the likes of charlton - they 're a former premier league side and everything about the club is incredible .
`` but we ca n't focus on that for the time being , we have to focus on the league because that is the more impregnation thing .
`` we 're delighted to have drawn such a good side , but we 've got to hit the pause button , we 've got to focus on the league , the next coming weeks will be a big few weeks for us . ''
author: Brent Pilnick
BBC Sport

documents.title: tom daley collects honorary degree in plymouth
text: diver tom daley has told university graduates `` together we can make the world a better place '' as he collected his honorary degree in his home city .
the 23-year-old diver collected the accolade from plymouth marjon university at the city 's guildhall
kingsbridge hockey player , giselle ansley , is also being awarded an honorary degree during today 's ceremony .
'we put enormous amounts of pressure on ourselves going into exams ' - tom daley has told the audience at plymouth guildhall .
tom daley is presented with an honorary degree from marjon .
'together we can make this world a better place ' - tom daley tells marjon graduates at # plymouth guildhall .
author: Clare Woodling
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: central role key to reid 's improvement
text: torquay united manager gary owers says jamie reid 's upturn in form is down to him playing in a more central role .
the 23-year-old forward joined the gulls on a permanent deal this week , having been on loan from exeter city .
he has since scored in their past two matches as the gulls have moved off the bottom of the national league table .
`` i always felt he 'd be better down the middle of the pitch and the two games he 's had so far have proved that point , '' owers told bbc sport .

`` he 's been a little bit of a victim of circumstances when we 've tried to play a little bit tighter and he 's been an attacking player in a wide area , but with lots of defensive responsibilities .
`` that 's changed a bit for him , although he does give a lot to the team defensively because he works so hard , and i hope to see him score many more goals for us . ''
author: Brent Pilnick
BBC Sport

documents.title: breakingman dies after being found in car in devon river
text: a man has died after being found in the river lemon in newton abbot , police have said .
officers were called to the scene at about 06:20 after a car was found in the river .
he was removed from the vehicle and taken to torbay hospital where he died .
his next of kin are being told .
the death is not believed to be sus police added .
author: Hayley Westcott
BBC News Online

documents.title: half of plymouth families 'a month away from going hungry '
text: close to half of plymouth parents are less than a month away from not being able to put food on the table , according to new research .
author: Plymouth Herald

documents.title: tom daley to receive honorary degree
text: tom daley has arrived at plymouth guildhall to receive an honorary degree from plymouth marjon university .
the 23-year-old diver , who is from the city , became world champion having secured the individual 10m platform gold medal at the world championships earlier this year .
kingsbridge hockey player , giselle ansley , is also being awarded the accolade during today 's ceremony .
tom daley arrives at plymouth guildhall to receive an honorary degree .
more @ twitterid
author: Clare Woodling
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: breakinghundreds of exeter homes disrupted after major gas leak
text: about 1,000 properties in exeter will have their gas supplies turned off while engineers work on repairing a major leak .
wales and west utilities says teams will visit every customer in 33 streets to shut supplies down , and then reconnect them once repairs are finished .
the utilities company says contractors working in newcourt way seriously damaged the network last night but it 's not yet clear how long repairs will take .
it 's providing alternative heating and cooking for vulnerable customers and is stressing that anyone who needs help should get in touch - 0800 912 2999 or by enquiries @ wwutilities.co.uk .
author: BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: pirates boosted by evans return
text: canada back matt evans is set to return to the cornish pirates side for the first time this year .
the 30-year-old needed two operations to fix a knee injury he suffered in a british & irish cup game in december .
his return , along with that of compatriot brett beukeboom , bolsters a pirates squad that has been hit by a series of injuries .
`` matt evans is coming back after a long lay off , and he 's looking fit and ready for it , '' said coach alan paver .
`` we 're not a million miles away from some of the regular faces like chris morgan and paul andrew returning .

`` we forget we have alex cheesman and tom duncan , who were massive for us last season and just have n't quite got themselves fit enough to get themselves on the pitch of any note this season , '' paver told bbc radio cornwall .
author: Brent Pilnick
BBC Sport

documents.title: firefighters continue to 'monitor hotspots ' at fire-hit pub
text: a cornish pub has been damaged after a fire broke out in the early hours , which led to the evacuation of 11 people .
emergency services said no-one was injured in the blaze at the halfway house inn , near wadebridge .
the cause of the fire is not thought to be sus
cornwall fire and rescue service evacuated people that were staying at the inn .
fire crews are still `` monitoring hotspots '' this morning .
author: BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: cornish poultry farm produces liquid egg
text: a poultry farm in cornwall has diversified into producing pasteurised liquid egg .
st ewe free range eggs near tregony has invested in a machine which can break and separate 500kg of eggs an hour .
the companies that use egg white and yolk separately are bakeries and manufacturers .
author: BBC Spotlight

documents.title: royal cornwall hospital put on 'black alert ' 99 times in nine months
text: cornwall 's main hospital at treliske has been forced to declare a 'black alert ' 99 times in just nine months .
author: Cornwall Live

documents.title: royal clarence hotel fire : one year on
text: this weekend marks 12 months since fire devastated exeter 's royal clarence hotel - described as england 's oldest hotel - on cathedral green .
the fire broke out above the castle fine art gallery where renovation work was under way , before spreading to the well house tavern , a cafe and the royal clarence hotel .
one year on , some traders nearby say they 're still feeling the financial impact , but are focusing on the future .
meanwhile a play capturing the history and memories of the hotel is in its final stages of rehearsals and will be performed later this autumn at the exeter cygnet theatre .
the rebuilding of the hotel is expected to take 18 months to complete and is due to reopen in 2019 .
one year on , @ twitterid discussing the # clarencehotel fire in # exeter .
such a loss for the city .
superb work by @ twitterid though !
author: BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: exeter gas leak : engineers 'still working to repair pipe '
text: one lane remains closed on the a379 in exeter following a gas leak near the new ikea store .
the single northbound lane near sandy park is n't thought to be causing any travel disruption .
police were called to the scene at about 19:00 on thursday after a gas pipe was `` seriously damaged '' .
wales and west utilities says it is still working to repair it .
author: Hamish Marshall
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: weather update : a dry day with sunshine
text: early cloud will clear to leave a dry and bright day .
there will be plenty of sunshine with light winds .
maximum temperature : 15c ( 59f ) .
author: Dan Downs
Weather Forecaster

documents.title: chelsea 's ampadu impresses former boss
text: exeter city manager paul tisdale says he is not surprised that ethan ampadu has made his full chelsea debut .
the 17-year-old started for the premier league champions for the first time in their efl cup win over everton , having moved from exeter in the summer .
exeter-born ampadu came up through city 's academy and became the club 's youngest player when he made his debut aged 15 years and 331 days last year .
`` he 's highly-motivated and we think he 'll do really well , '' tisdale told bbc sport .

`` we 've heard about his progress in the last two or three months , so to hear he 's been selected , played really well , played 90 minutes , we 're delighted for him - but we 're not surprised , he 's very talented . ''
exeter and chelsea have still to agree a fee for ampadu , who was called up to the wales squad by chris coleman for their most recent world cup qualifiers .
author: Brent Pilnick
BBC Sport

documents.title: lane remains closed after gas leak in exeter
text: engineers are still working at the scene of a major gas leak near the new ikea store in exeter .
most roads have now reopened but a single northbound lane closure is still in place on the a379 near sandy park .
police were called to the scene at about 19:00 on thursday after reports a construction worker accidentally cut through a gas main .
gas staff still on site at new ikea site in exeter after last nights gas leak .
1 lane closed on a379 - not causing any major delays .
gas staff still on site at new ikea site in exeter after last nights gas leak .
1 lane closed on a379 - not causing any major delays .
author: Hamish Marshall
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: cornish pub fire : what we know so far
text: crews have worked hard through the night to save a # stissey pub .
great team work by all involved .
we are still on scene monitoring hotspots .
good work
awful news
morning takw good care
author: Hayley Westcott
BBC News Online

documents.title: couple jailed for live streaming child abuse
text: a woman from plymouth has been jailed for nine years for sexually assaulting a girl during a live stream on the internet .
sarah gotham , 34 , was found guilty of six charges whilst a man who she had sex with while the girl lay in bed admitted four charges of sexual assault .
the activities of gotham and craig forbes , 36 , of torquay , were viewed by a paedophile in america who alerted police .
forbes was jailed for eight years .
passing sentence , judge ian lawrie said he believed gotham had been `` corrupted '' by forbes and had been `` under his spell '' .
he [ forbes ] is manipulative , devious and is unquestionably interested in child pornography and from everything i have read and heard a clear and constant threat to children .
author: Hamish Marshall
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: police hunt man in bushes next to scene of major exeter gas leak
text: police are hunting a man seen just metres from the site of a major gas leak in exeter on thursday evening .
author: Devon Live

documents.title: devon travel : exeter lane closure and plymouth traffic lights fail
text: devon travel : exeter lane closure and plymouth traffic lights fail
author: BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: dartmoor national park bans drones
text: drones are being banned on dartmoor following reports they 've been flown too close to people , cars and livestock .
dartmoor national park authority says it 's using a by-law to ban unmanned aerial vehicles because of complaints they 're affecting people 's enjoyment of the area as well as concerns for safety .
the authority says some drone use will still be allowed , but on a case-by-case basis .
author: Kirk England
BBC Radio Devon

documents.title: eleven people evacuated from cornish pub fire
text: a pub on the a39 in cornwall has been evacuated after a fire broke out overnight .
cornwall fire and rescue service moved 11 people to safety from the halfway house inn , near st issey , in the early hours of friday morning .
crews used breathing apparatus to tackle the blaze while road closures were put in place .
no-one has been injured .
police said the blaze was not thought to be sus
author: BBC Radio Cornwall

documents.title: devon couple jailed for live streaming child abuse
text: a couple who sexually assaulted a child and live streamed the abuse to an american paedophile via skype have been jailed .
sarah gotham , 34 , and craig forbes , 36 , drugged and then abused the girl between december 2012 and march 2013 .
gotham , of plymouth , was jailed for nine years and forbes , of torquay , was sentenced to eight years in prison .
they streamed the abuse to convicted sex offender kori ellis , 42 , who was in california , plymouth crown court heard .
forbes had earlier admitted three charges of sexual assault , possession of indecent images and breaching a sexual harm prevention order .
gotham was found guilty of six charges of sexual assault of a child under 13 following a trial at plymouth crown court .
author: Hamish Marshall
BBC Spotlight

documents.title: gas leak closes road as engineers work to repair damaged pipe
text: engineers are working to repair a damaged gas main near the new ikea store in exeter .
police were called to the scene at about 19:00 on thursday after reports a construction worker accidentally cut through a gas main .
wales and west utilities says its team are still on site due to the extent of the damage .
most roads have now reopened but a single northbound lane closure is still in place on the a379 around sandy park .
we 're really sorry for the disruption on a379 in exeter .
workers in the area have seriously damaged the gas network
author: BBC Spotlight

documents.title: news , sport , weather and travel for friday
text: good morning from bbc local live .
we 'll be bringing you the news , sport , travel and weather for devon and cornwall today .
if you want to get in touch , please email us .
author: Hayley Westcott
BBC News Online
